Token.Abstract: Creates and returns a new NSString object initialized with a natural language version of the source date in relation to now.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new NSString object, configured with a natual language representation of the source date.

Token.Abstract: Creates and returns a new NSString object initialized with a simple display of a date range, between the source date and the end data parameter.

Parameter.Name: end
Parameter.Abstract: The end date for the date range string.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new NSString object, configured with a simple representation of a date range (ie: MMM d-d, yyyy).

Token.Abstract: Creates an returns a new NSString object initialized with a localized version of the source date.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new NSString object, configured with a localized version of the source date.
